projects.title: GoGig
projects.desc: A job search and recruiting platform.  My roles were developing the open REST API for the platform, as well as the front end of the web app, and the front end of the marketing website for the platform.  Core Technologies: Javascript, Backbone, PHP, Slim

projects.title: MAD Greetings
projects.desc: An augmented realty greeting card app.  My role was developing the open REST API for the app.  Core Technologies: PHP, Slim

projects.title: Clue Video
projects.desc: A business and classifieds video directory.  My roles were developing the Android and iOS app.  Core Technologies: Javascript, Cordova/Phonegap, Backbone, PHP, Slim
